languages.text: "Благодать можно насаждать среди черни столь прямо, как это делает Инцендия Чорда? И Домин имеет право поступать так же?"
"Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"
languages.original_text: "Благодать можно насаждать среди черни столь прямо, как это делает Инцендия Чорда? И Домин имеет право поступать так же?"

traits.locale_text: "Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"
"Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"
"Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"
"Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"
"Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"

languages.text: "Man kann Mitgliedern des Pöbels auch direkt einen Segen gewähren, wie Incendia Chorda es tut? Und {mf|der|die} Domin hat das Recht, dasselbe zu tun?"
languages.original_text: "Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"

traits.locale_text: "Man kann Mitgliedern des Pöbels auch direkt einen Segen gewähren, wie Incendia Chorda es tut? Und {mf|der|die} Domin hat das Recht, dasselbe zu tun?"

languages.text: « Les bienfaits peuvent être directement prodigués aux paysans, comme le fait Incendia Chorda ? Et {mf|le|la} Domin a le droit d'en faire autant ? »
languages.original_text: "Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"

traits.locale_text: « Les bienfaits peuvent être directement prodigués aux paysans, comme le fait Incendia Chorda ? Et {mf|le|la} Domin a le droit d'en faire autant ? »

languages.text: «¿Se pueden otorgar bendiciones directamente a la plebe, como hace Incendia Chorda? ¿Y {mf|el|la} Domin tiene derecho a hacer lo mismo?».
languages.original_text: "Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Se pueden otorgar bendiciones directamente a la plebe, como hace Incendia Chorda? ¿Y {mf|el|la} Domin tiene derecho a hacer lo mismo?».

languages.text: 「インセンディア・チョーダがそうであるように、祝福は農民に直接授けられるのかしら？ドミンも同じことをする権利があるのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"

traits.locale_text: 「インセンディア・チョーダがそうであるように、祝福は農民に直接授けられるのかしら？ドミンも同じことをする権利があるのかしら？」

languages.text: “行商浪人有权直接对民众进行赐福，就像因森蒂娅·库尔达做的那样吗？秘者也有权利这么做吗？”
languages.original_text: "Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人有权直接对民众进行赐福，就像因森蒂娅·库尔达做的那样吗？秘者也有权利这么做吗？”

languages.original_text: "Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"

languages.text: "Lütuflar, İncendia Chorda'nın yaptığı gibi köylülere doğruca bahşedilebilir mi? Domin'in de aynısını yapmaya hakkı var mı?"
languages.original_text: "Blessings can be bestowed upon peasants directly, as Incendia Chorda does? And the Domin has the right to do the same?"
